short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight any term on a page, right click and "Search" your favorite Amazon site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily search your favorite local Amazon store by highlighting any term on a page, right clicking and click "Search Amazon".
